metadata.title: CVE-2017-7772 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Heap-based Buffer Overflow in Graphite2 library in Firefox before 54 inlz4::decompress function.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-7772` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libgraphite2-3 - 1.3.10-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
No subscription required

firefox - 54.0+build3-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
firefox-globalmenu - 54.0+build3-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
firefox-mozsymbols - 54.0+build3-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
firefox-testsuite - 54.0+build3-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
No subscription required

thunderbird - 1:52.2.1+build1-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
thunderbird-globalmenu - 1:52.2.1+build1-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
thunderbird-gnome-support - 1:52.2.1+build1-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
thunderbird-mozsymbols - 1:52.2.1+build1-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
thunderbird-testsuite - 1:52.2.1+build1-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
xul-ext-calendar-timezones - 1:52.2.1+build1-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
xul-ext-gdata-provider - 1:52.2.1+build1-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
xul-ext-lightning - 1:52.2.1+build1-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
No subscription required
